attributes.additional_details: The Scottish people find the current situation with UK Trident unacceptable. We are no longer willing to accept the current threat the Scottish people are constantly living in as a result of UK nuclear weaponry being stored at faslane naval base. The devastation that would be brought to Scotland in the event of an accident or preemptive strike would be catastrophic and as a nation we are saying " we do not want it in our country " .
